flawed_nl_solution:
The total cost for the vacation rentals will be $3200 + $800 = $<<3200+800=4000>>4000.
The cost per person will be $4000 / 8 = $<<4000/8=5000>>5000.
#### 5000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 5000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
